## How to Use These Files

### In Your DAW:
1. Import all MIDI files into separate tracks
2. Set up tempo automation:
   - 0:00-4:00 â†’ 180 BPM (death metal sections)
   - 4:00-6:00 â†’ 70 BPM (doom break)
   - 6:00-8:00 â†’ 160 BPM (progressive sections)
   - 8:00-12:00 â†’ 180 BPM (final sections)

### Arrangement Suggestion:
```
[Intro Hoglan] â†’ [Verse Hoglan] â†’ [Chorus] â†’
[Verse Hoglan] â†’ [Chorus] â†’ [DOOM BREAK] â†’
[Progressive Chambers] â†’ [Progressive Weckl] â†’
[Final Verse Hoglan] â†’ [Extended Chorus]
```

### Time Signature Variations:
- **Death sections**: 4/4 standard
- **Doom break**: 4/4 but with half-time feel
- **Progressive**: Consider 7/8 or 5/4 for added complexity
